title: House for Sale in Mirihana
details:
Architecturally designed 2 Storied House around 4850 Sq.Ft.

6 Rooms, ,4 Bathrooms, Pantry, TV Lobby, Balconies , Living Room, Dining Room ,

CCTV Camera, hot water , solar power system

Swimming pool, Large garden space,

with roller shutter gate and parking for 6 Cars,

Good Neighborhood & Calm & quite area

21.5 Perch land.
Rs. 73 Million (negotiable)

Please call for more information
